**Bidding Instructions and Requirements**
To be considered, all bid submissions must be received at the latest by 14:00 HNE on November 17, 2022. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

**Project Overview**
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking an electrical construction contractor to provide services for the replacement of the aspirating smoke detection system in Building I at the Donnacona institution, located in the Quebec region.

**Scope of Work**
The work includes the replacement of the aspirating smoke detection system at the Donnacona institution.
